olia(Lavender*) Flower Water, Aspalathus Linearis(Rooibos*) Leaf Extract, Lavandula Angustifolia(Lavender*) Flower Extract, Calendula Officinalis(Calendula*) Flower Extract, Punica Granatum(Pomegranate**) Seed Extract, Aphanizomenon Flos-Aqua(Blue Green Algae*), Tocopherol(Vitamin E**), Helianthus Annuus(Sunflower**) Seed Oil, Xanthan Gum**

anthan Gum**
